entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, an orphan boy who is being discussed by Mrs Cole and Dumbledore.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A wise and powerful wizard who is having a conversation with Mrs Cole about Harry Potter.

entities.name: mrs cole
entities.description: The woman who is talking to Dumbledore about Harry Potter, she seems to know him from his past.

relationships.description: Dumbledore confirms that Harry Potter has a place at his school.
